entities.name: frank
entities.description: The protagonist of the story. He is described as having a bad leg and using a walking stick.

entities.name: riddle house
entities.description: A house that belongs to Frank, where he lives. It has a front door and windows, but also a hidden door at the back.

relationships.description: Frank owns the Riddle House. This is inferred from the fact that he has a key to the hidden door at the back of the house.
Frank lives in the Riddle House. This is implied by the fact that he has a kitchen and a hall in the house.
